snippet: The C-1, being built by Lit Motors, is a bike encased in a metal shell that is meant to provide the convenience of a motorcycle with the amenities of a car.
abstract: Small start-up Lit Motors is developing the C-1, electric motorcycle encased in metal shell that is meant to provide the convenience of a motorcycle with the amenities of a car.
